channel.title: Making the background of the welcome screen black! PLEASE!

item.title: Making the background of the welcome screen black! PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Hello! I have recently been hurling my efforts into making my server have a good and wholesome FULL SCREEN interface on startup. Ive gotten far enough that I can make it happen on login if you are not a new player and I have text in a few boxes! My problem right now has been my mother the fact that the player is able to see through the welcome screen and to the game. Is it possible to make a black background that covers the entire frame?

My code so far.

public void sendWelcomeScreen() {
	sendInterface(15244, 5993);
	sendString("Welcome to RuneScape", 15257);
	sendString("", 15258);
	sendString("Make sure to set up a bank pin.", 15270);
}

Read full topic
item.source: Making the background of the welcome screen black! PLEASE!
